turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, would you mind ordering some coffee for me?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No, not at all. Where would you like to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The Starbucks on Main Street in Hesperia.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, no problem. What would you like.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I get a latte with almond milk

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, any flavorings for it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hm, yeah actually. Can you make it vanilla?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, sugar free vanilla, or regular?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh, sugar free please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem, what size will that be?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: A grande, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, and would you like anything extra? Maybe an extra shot of espresso or anything?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, I'll put that order in now.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, your order has processed and it's being made now.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Cool.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It'll be ready for pickup shortly, and your receipt will be sent to your phone shortly.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks so much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem, have a nice day.
